name: voice-to-todoist
description: Raycast Script Command: Capture a voice note via SuperWhisper and create a smart Todoist task with Claude.

scripts.install:raycast: mkdir -p "$HOME/Documents/Raycast Scripts" && ln -sf "$PWD/tools/voice-note-raycast.js" "$HOME/Documents/Raycast Scripts/voice-to-todoist.js" && echo 'Linked voice-to-todoist.js into Raycast Scripts.'

author: Jack Arturo
